answers.answer: Yeah  sounds like high blood pressure
every time i go in to get checked. its high..

And they are not worried by it? Pre aclampsia signs are high bp, headaches, swelling, dizziness, pain around the top of your bump and shortness of breath. Protein in your urine can also be a sign to. I would consult your doctor x
i called right now, and only the pedriatrician is there, my doc comes in till tomorow..
And well idk, i have gestational dietbetes. And i berly found out 2 weeks ago..

the gestational diabetes explaines it...my sister had that when she was  pregnant with my niece and her doctor put her on bed rest in the hospital so she could watch her...your doctor should really be concerned about u and the baby

I know, if anything ill be going to the hospital today, Because i have problems of my own,i have some heart problems, palpitations, anxiety, ptsd, asthma, pregnancy, gd, i guess high blood pressure too.. What can be the outcome of all of this?
I'd maybe think about going to A&E to get checked out. Your so close now and nothing is worth the risk. Peace of mind then x
thanks, my hubbt sayd, that if i do go. will they make me dilver her?
Quite possibly. I'm sure they will run some tests. Stay relaxed as best you can and go there. Keep us updated.xx
yea if it seems like its putting too much stress on the baby they may deliver u...but good luck
i hope so, i dont want to keep her inside, knowing that the doctors really dont care.
I had preeclampsia when i was like that with my first pregnancy
is it kinda what im feeling?

question: so lately i wake up swollen like a balloon, short air, and they say i look really really pale. And i get dizzy, im 38+7.
title: What is this?
